__e: My God but what have I done to deserve this. I, who have always believed in you, who still goes to mass 3 times a year, who's never hurt anyone.
We know how we're dying, but why it's happening, what we did to deserve this, who the hell knows?
As far as I can see, the only thing he's done to deserve it is picking his friends poorly.
I mean, what did he do to deserve what they did to him?
But now that you exposed what you really think of yourself and that you really don't believe you deserve this job...
I haven't done anything to deserve this yet, but... thank you so much.
I have fought hard over the years to earn your trust. And I solemnly swear to all of you that I will continue to uphold the ideals of truth and justice. Not just for America, but for all the world.
You trust me, and I shall act to deserve your trust.
I understand that, Mr President, but I hope, over time, to earn your forgiveness.
Do you feel you don't deserve a happy family because of your past?
I must have done something right to deserve a visit from you.
It's like there's not really any words to describe the feeling of that, because it's just... I mean, I almost feel like I don't know what I did to deserve such an amazing person.
And you played so well that I think you deserve a drink.
I took the blame for you and your friends so I think I deserve a little trust.
I don't know what I did to deserve such a good man.
You, on the other hand, you're just not formidable enough to have ever earned my respect.
I might have done enough to earn a pardon this time.
Listen, I know I probably don't deserve it, but if you would give me a second chance, I'd really like to earn my grade.
